messages.content:

timecard error timecard error hi still can submit her hours we have able make some changes but some other errors appear could you please help thank you manager sent monday october timecard error hi submitted her timecard for week october then she tried error can be changed her manager paternity leave delegated authority approve timecards but can them yet screen ask you reject reopen timecard we submit again thank you manager
